page.title: 06House Conversions in Keyham
page.content: Keyham contains many houses which have been converted by their present or past owners into houses with all the normal, modern amenities. The{Old {School House}was built over 100 years ago as part of the Free School Movement. The present owners converted it in 1955 from a one-roomed building into the house it now is. {Mayfield Barn}was a cow-shed but is now a two-storey house.{Mayfield {Cottage}was a simple lean-to shelter for tractors. After conversion it is an attractive single-storey cottage. {King's Corner}was a cow shed and stables before builders started work on it. Now it is a very large one- storey family home.
